meanings.definition: The quality, state, or characteristic of being artistic or creative.
meanings.sent1: Her artinesses shone through in every painting she created.
meanings.sent2: The artinesses of the sculpture were truly captivating.
meanings.sent3: His artinesses in arranging flowers always brought a smile to everyone's face.
meanings.sent4: The artinesses of her dance moves were like a beautiful symphony in motion.
meanings.sent5: The artinesses of his storytelling made the audience feel like they were living in a painting.

meanings.definition: The use of artistic techniques or effects in a work of art.
meanings.sent1: The film director's artinesses were evident in the way he framed each shot.
meanings.sent2: The artinesses of the play added depth and emotion to the performance.
meanings.sent3: The artinesses of the cake decoration made it almost too beautiful to eat.
meanings.sent4: Her artinesses with makeup turned ordinary faces into works of art.
meanings.sent5: The artinesses of the music composition transported the listeners to another world.

meanings.definition: The excessive or affected display of artistic qualities or techniques.
meanings.sent1: The artinesses of his outfit made him stand out at the party.
meanings.sent2: Her artinesses in conversation sometimes made it hard to understand her true feelings.
meanings.sent3: The artinesses of the room decor bordered on being too extravagant.
meanings.sent4: His artinesses in writing bordered on pretentiousness at times.
meanings.sent5: The artinesses of the performance were so over-the-top that it became comical.
